\Aura\View\Helper

\Aura\View\HelperForm

Namespaces

Input

Classes

Checkboxes Helper for series of `<input type="checkbox">` tags.
Field A locator to generate form field elements.
Input A locator to create input field objects.
Radios Helper for series of `<input type="radio">` tags.
Repeat A locator to generate a repeated form field element.
Select Helper for `<select>` tag with `<option>` and `<optgroup>` tags.
Textarea Helper for a `<textarea>` tag.
